head.title: Experience - Steff Beckers
head.description: My work experience, acquired certificates and education. I'm a passionate developer with a strong focus on web development and DevOps. I thrive on learning and working with the latest technologies and frameworks to continuously grow my expertise. I enjoy collaborating as part of a team in an agile environment, where I can contribute to building impactful solutions. I'm detail-oriented, committed to getting things right, and understand that even the smallest details can make a big difference.
head.keywords: Steff, Beckers, Developer, Personal website, Blog, Projects, Resume, CV, Work, Experience, Fuzed, Codefined, aariXa, CTG, Brigestone, PXL
